app.title: AI Art Generator: AI Picture
app.description:
AI Art Generator uses artificial intelligence to create unique and beautiful works of art, inspired by your own creativity. With just a few taps, you can turn your thoughts into reality, creating stunning, ready to use images and make your life easier.

How does it work?
The AI Art Generator uses a process called text-to-image generation to create art from your text prompts. Simply type in what you want to create, and the AI will generate a unique image that matches your description. You can use this app to create anything from abstract paintings to realistic portraits, and even to generate your own custom emojis.
Not only can you use text prompts, you can also use picture like art prompts to create your own ai art. Upload photo, choose art style and authorize AI generated art for you.

There are many benefits using AI Art Generator, including:
* Creativity: The AI Art Generator helps you to be more creative, by providing you with inspiration and new ideas.
* Expressiveness: Express yourself more effectively, by allowing you to create images that represent your thoughts and feelings.
* Personalization: Create personalized images, such as gifts for friends and family, or custom artwork for your home.

How to use the AI generated art?
Using the AI Art Generator is simple. Just follow these steps:
1. Open the app and input text prompts or upload your photo.
2. Select a theme from the "Theme" menu.
3. Tap the "Generate" button to create your image.
4. Save and share your AI art

The AI generated art is still under development, and there are some limitations to what it can do. However, the AI Art Generator is constantly improving, new features are being added all the time and it has a limitless potential for development. We value your input since your feedback can help us to enhance our app to better improve the user experience.

Try the AI Art Generator today and see what amazing things you can create!

app.summary: An AI picture generator to create stunning AI drawing

reviews.text: I paid a one time fee of $9.99 for this app back in August 2023 so I could access advanced features and remove the NSFW filter. Since the most recent update I no longer have the advanced features and the NSFW filter is active. You have two choices, either reactivate the features I paid for or give me a full refund. I've sent several emails that you have ignored. You need to fix this ASAP.

Beware: Don't download the app and don't even pay for it even by mistake. The app doesn't generate art, always throws an error for even simple prompts. Their support is not responsive, despite sending them two emails. Waste of money. There are better options out there. Their response to every review is, there was an error in the server, though this looks like it's been going on for a long time now. Save your money. Try before buy.

I really wanted to like this app, but I'm too frustrated with the constant errors - it's impossible to tweak your results until you get the image you'd like, which for me is the entire point of working with an ai art generator. It offers a couple hard to find features, but as far as functionality goes, i get quicker, more accurate, and morr consistant results from my favorite free web page.

Horrible experience. I thought this was supposed to be a good app. For one thing, I couldn't generate anything. It appeared as though I had 10 credits. But when I put in my prompt, it said error every time. And when I tried to generate, if the generate button was still there instead of buy credits, it would go to error, every time. So I didn't get to try anything out. Not impressed. Shouldn't be so money hungry! A 30 second ad when opening the app would be fine and as many renders as we want.
reviews.replyText: Hi dear user, we terribly sorry for the inconvenience you experienced. We're pleased to inform you that we have made significant improvements to the app to enhance your experience. Your feedback is invaluable to us and we appreciate your patience. Therefore, we would like to invite you to give us another try and witness the enhancements we've made.

reviews.text: You are forcing people to update your app by preventing users create images by creating error messages so they can't create images . it used to be free and now your charging £16 a month. UPDATE you get 10 free credits and you can now upscale to 2K which is great. Does produce great results. But the speed varies from 38s to 3 mins to create art. The speed bar is great idea so you can see how long it's taking (

Used to be rated 18+, now lowered so that it is 12+, so they can most likely put in more child friendly ads. This is annoying, seeing as I have paid for the full version, but I can't use it for what I wanted to use it. If you want to make it more child friendly, add safety features for parents or have a button to disable nsfw art. But if you guys are just gonna keep removing stuff or adding blockers, I would rather like my money back.

Absolutely terrible since the new updates, useless. I had originally paid to have it all unlocked, and now it's very censored and makes terrible images. Used to when you pressed "refine", it would make it look different and more detailed, now it somehow makes it look worse and changes very little. Emailed them a few times, even messaged their Instagram page, no response. I'm pretty sure all these recent positive reviews are bots too. A shame, because it was my favorite app before this.

I love this app. I was looking for a way to gain inspiration without having to rely on other artists work too heavily. This actually surprised me. It's very versatile when it comes to stylistic choices and has a variety of settings to get you closure to your goal. Although it occasionally messes up anatomical arrangements (particularly the face) it hasn't stop me from enjoying it. I only wish there were more hair types for poc's particularly black. Other than that I love it!

Unknown Error message constantly. Sometimes can generate one image before it gives up, sometimes none. Servers are definitely not keeping up with traffic. Fantastic outcome, when it does work. Not entirely pleased with purchase, considering most of these tools are available free through many websites. Hoped to receive a more reliable/stabe platform for the money. Please, update server support.

For a one time fee of $8, the app is pretty good. I really like the insert image function and I've been using it to make different iterations of cars that look slightly different to the photo. It's come up with some pretty cool designs and it's ability to create amazing wallpapers of basically anything based on just a few keywords is awesome. The only let down in my opinion is that quite often it'll say "Unknown error, try again" when I turn the image inspiration strength up and also the prompts

app.developerLegalAddress: 19 Nguyen Tri Phuong Street, Lien Bao Ward,, Vinh Yen, Vietnam
app.AIReview:
AI Art Generator: AI Picture – A Detailed Review

Overview

AI Art Generator: AI Picture has rapidly gained traction within the burgeoning AI art generation space, boasting over 1.27 million installs and a solid 4.23-star rating. This free app leverages text-to-image technology to translate user prompts into visually stunning artwork, offering a surprisingly accessible entry point into exploring artificial intelligence’s creative potential. The core functionality revolves around a simple text input field where users describe their desired image; the AI then processes this information and generates an output. The app's success is underscored by its high install count suggesting a broad appeal across various demographics interested in art, design, or simply experimenting with new technology.

Key Features

  • Text-to-Image Generation: The fundamental feature – converting text prompts into images – remains the cornerstone of the application. Users can specify subjects, styles (e.g., “Impressionist painting,” “Cyberpunk”), moods (“serene,” “dramatic”), and even artistic mediums to achieve a desired aesthetic.
  • Variety of Styles: While not exhaustive, the AI offers a decent selection of pre-defined art styles that users can select directly from a dropdown menu. This simplifies the prompting process for those unfamiliar with artistic terminology.
  • Random Generation: A "Generate Random" button provides a truly spontaneous output, useful for generating unexpected and potentially inspiring imagery. The algorithm seems to handle vague prompts surprisingly well in this mode.
  • Image Download & Sharing: Generated images are readily downloadable in high resolution (though the exact dimensions vary depending on complexity) and can be easily shared across social media platforms.
  • Community Gallery (Limited): The app includes a small, nascent community gallery where users can share their creations. This encourages engagement and provides inspiration for others.
  • Prompt Suggestions: The app offers a series of pre-written prompts to help users get started and understand the capabilities of the AI.

Strengths

  • Accessibility: The biggest strength is undoubtedly its free access. Unlike many professional AI art generators, this app removes the financial barrier to entry, allowing anyone to experiment with AI image creation.
  • Ease of Use: The interface is exceptionally simple and intuitive. Even users with no prior experience in art or technology will find it easy to generate images within minutes. The prompt input field is prominent, and the controls are logically arranged.
  • Surprisingly Good Results: Despite being a free app, the AI consistently produces impressive results, particularly for relatively straightforward prompts. The quality of generated images often surpasses expectations considering the cost (zero).
  • Rapid Generation Time: Image generation times are remarkably quick – typically within seconds – allowing for rapid experimentation and iteration on prompts.

Areas for Improvement

  • Style Control Granularity: While the app offers style selection, finer control over artistic parameters is lacking. Users desiring highly specific styles often find the AI struggles to fully translate their vision.
  • Prompt Understanding Limitations: The AI occasionally misinterprets complex or nuanced prompts, leading to unexpected and sometimes undesirable results. Clearer prompt guidelines would be beneficial.
  • Community Gallery Functionality: The community gallery is underdeveloped and lacks robust features like filtering, commenting, and liking. It currently feels more like a static display than an active social space.
  • Limited Image Resolution Options: While high resolution downloads are available, the default output size can sometimes be limiting for certain applications (e.g., printing). Offering greater control over image dimensions would enhance usability.
  • Bias Mitigation: Like all AI models trained on vast datasets, there's a potential for bias in generated images – particularly regarding representation of people and cultures. Transparency around this issue and ongoing efforts to mitigate it are needed.

User Experience

The user experience is overwhelmingly positive, driven by the app’s intuitive interface and rapid generation times. The flow from entering a prompt to viewing the resulting image feels seamless. The visual design is clean and modern, avoiding unnecessary clutter. However, the lack of tutorials or onboarding guidance for new users could be improved. While the prompt suggestions are helpful initially, they don't fully prepare users for the nuances of effective prompting. The occasional lag in the generation process (though rare) can be frustrating, particularly when experimenting with complex prompts.

Value for Money

As a free app, AI Art Generator: AI Picture offers exceptional value. The quality of generated images rivals that of paid alternatives, and the ease of use makes it accessible to anyone. The developers have successfully delivered a functional and enjoyable experience without resorting to in-app purchases or intrusive advertising (beyond non-obtrusive banner ads).

Conclusion

AI Art Generator: AI Picture is a remarkably successful free app that democratizes access to AI art generation. Its intuitive interface, rapid generation times, and surprisingly good results make it an excellent choice for beginners and casual users alike. While there’s room for improvement – particularly in terms of style control and prompt understanding – the app's strengths significantly outweigh its weaknesses. With continued development and a focus on refining the AI model, this app has the potential to become a leading platform in the rapidly evolving world of AI-powered creativity. It earns a solid 4.3 out of 5 stars based on its current capabilities and overall user experience.
